collectible.title: Noire's cookies
collectible.subtitle: Black Heart taste (dark chocolate)
collectible.text: "I can bake, of course. Anyone can do it; it's enough to follow a recipe. The only secret ingredient you need to use is your feelings toward the person you make the cookies for... D-Don't misunderstand me! I don't necessarily mean liking or love, or things like that! It can just be the feelings of... gratitude and such!"

collectible.title: Black Heart's chocolates
collectible.subtitle: Handmade and heart-shaped
collectible.text: "You won again, even more convincingly than before. I'm glad you've become so strong. As a reward, accept these chocolates. I transformed into my goddess form before making them, because I wanted the higher stats to make them as delicious and pretty as possible... You do understand what I mean by their shape and by giving them to you on a day like this, so I don't have to say anything more... Right?"
collectible.unlock: Win another game against Noire in her La Victoire costume, either during the Valentine's Day event or on the "romantic" background, and avoid losing too many clothes.

collectible.title: Noire plushie
collectible.subtitle: Nowagurumi
collectible.text:
A gift to help you rest with a peace of mind when Noire herself cannot sleep next to you. Effectiveness confirmed by Uni.</br></br>
(Made by Plutia. She will happily present Noire with another one.)
collectible.unlock: Tire Noire out and then let her witness something so unexciting that she falls asleep. Can be unlocked with Noire wearing (or rather no longer wearing) any costume.

collectible.title: Noire and the plushie
collectible.subtitle: Only one of them has removable clothes
collectible.text: "You brought my plushie with you! That was cute, thank you! Hm? You want to take a picture of me sitting next to it? Okay, I may let you take one... as an exceptional one-time reward for how well you played today... How should I pose?</br></br>H-huh?! In just my sleeves, boots and thigh-highs?! You have some guts to ask a goddess for that! And some quite particular tastes! I do like cosplay, as you're the only one to know... but not that kind of cosplay! ...P-Probably not, at least!!...</br></br>W-Well... If you really want me to do it no matter what, then I will pose... just this once! But if you're to have a picture of me, I want it to be a good one, so be serious and take it properly!"
collectible.unlock: Have the collectible above unlocked, play a game on the classroom background and win against Noire (in her La Victoire costume) without losing too many clothes.

collectible.title: Noire's showdown lingerie
collectible.subtitle: It's not like she wore it—and took it off—for you
collectible.text:
Noire gave you her favorite lingerie set as a keepsake after she lost it in a game of strip poker.
Maybe next time you meet in Lastation, she will wear a similar set of underwear, maybe a different one... And maybe she will even allow you to take it off her yourself? </br></br>(The lingerie is a secret memento of your time spent with a pure-hearted goddess. Do not think about wearing it. Probably, the size would not match anyway.)
collectible.unlock: A secret collectible. Make Noire in her La Victoire costume lose her lingerie and pose for you naked. (Hint: She may do it if she stays unclothed but still in the game for many rounds.)

collectible.title: Noire's Cool Girl Bracelets
collectible.subtitle: Fitting her idol costume
collectible.text: Noire's own bracelets or maybe just very similar bracelets that she gave you after she lost to you once again in a game of strip poker.</br></br>"You know perfectly well what my bracelets look like. Just accept them already instead of making me pose in them like this for no reason."
collectible.unlock: Convincingly win against Noire in her Cool Girl costume. Do not lose too many clothes.
